mapper.sql: call_id, gw_name, line_id, line_name, call_type, calling_nbr, called_nbr, connect_flag, end_code, call_start_time, talk_start_time, talk_end_time, is_readed
mapper.select: select c.call_id call_id, gw_name, line_id, line_name, call_type, calling_nbr, called_nbr, connect_flag, end_code, call_start_time, talk_start_time, talk_end_time, is_readed,file_name from t_srvdata_gw_call_log c,t_srvdata_gw_record_log r where c.call_id=r.call_id and (c.calling_nbr = #{userId} or c.called_nbr= #{userId}) and (talk_start_time between #{start} and #{end}) and c.called_nbr not like '900%' order by talk_start_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_srvdata_gw_call_log (call_id, gw_name, line_id, line_name, call_type, calling_nbr, called_nbr, connect_flag, end_code, call_start_time, talk_start_time, talk_end_time, is_readed) values (#{callId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gwName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{callingNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calledNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connectFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{callStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{talkStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{talkEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isReaded,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_srvdata_gw_call_log
call_id,
gw_name,
line_id,
line_name,
call_type,
calling_nbr,
called_nbr,
connect_flag,
end_code,
call_start_time,
talk_start_time,
talk_end_time,
is_readed,
#{callId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gwName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_srvdata_gw_call_log
gw_name = #{gwName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
line_name = #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
call_type = #{callType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
calling_nbr = #{callingNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
called_nbr = #{calledNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
connect_flag = #{connectFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_code = #{endCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
call_start_time = #{callStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
talk_start_time = #{talkStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
talk_end_time = #{talkEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_readed = #{isReaded,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where call_id = #{callId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_srvdata_gw_call_log set gw_name = #{gwName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, line_name = #{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_type = #{callType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, calling_nbr = #{callingNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, called_nbr = #{calledNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, connect_flag = #{connectFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_code = #{endCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, call_start_time = #{callStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, talk_start_time = #{talkStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, talk_end_time = #{talkEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_readed = #{isReaded,jdbcType=INTEGER} where call_id = #{callId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
